p: The rates of infection with PDCoV and coinfection with PDCoV and PEDV in diarrhoeal pigs were analysed according to age, year, and season. Significance was set at p < 0.05. Possible risk factors associated with virus infection were analysed by univariate and multivariate exact logistic regression models using Stata/SE 15.1 (Stata Corporation, USA). For each model the odds ratio (OR) and 95% confidence interval (CI) were calculated.
